tool_description: Analyzes venue power requirements and availability for photography equipment, calculating power consumption and recommending battery backup solutions.

equipment_list.description: List of powered equipment (strobes, LED_panels, laptops, etc.)

venue_power_specs.description: Venue power specifications (standard_outlets, limited_outlets, no_power, generator_available)

simultaneous_usage.description: Whether all equipment will be used simultaneously

error_messages: Empty equipment list: Provide at least one powered equipment item.
Invalid power specifications: Use standard_outlets, limited_outlets, no_power, or generator_available.
Invalid event duration: Duration must be between 1 and 24 hours.
Unknown equipment type: Ensure all equipment types are recognized in the power database.
usage: List your powered equipment, specify venue power availability, and event duration. The tool will analyze power requirements and recommend solutions for power management.

power_management_tips.description: Tips for efficient power management during the event
